responsibilities: Rapid prototyping of AI agents and generative AI experiences
Implementation and maintenance of RAG pipelines
Integrate AI solutions with the existing product platform
Evaluate, measure, and improve performance on a continuous basis
Apply and extend state-of-the-art techniques across the full spectrum of generative AI
Collaborate, review, and improve engineering outputs
Stay on top of industry developments and experiment with cutting-edge techniques
skills: Strong foundation in software engineering skills and design patterns
Optional experience with TypeScript and proficiency in front-end technologies like React
Proven track record of shipping products powered by LLMs, RAG systems, and/or AI agents
Comfortability working in a startup environment embedded within an enterprise
Passion for pushing the boundaries of AI and commitment to staying at the cutting edge of industry trends and technologies
analysis:
The job responsibilities include "Rapid prototyping of AI agents and generative AI experiences," "Development of LLM-powered products," and "Apply and extend state-of-the-art techniques across the full spectrum of generative AI." These clearly indicate involvement with Generative AI and language models. Additionally, the responsibility to "Evaluate, measure, and improve performance on a continuous basis" suggests ongoing work with AI systems, likely involving LLMs.

The skills section mentions a "Proven track record of shipping products powered by LLMs, RAG systems, and/or AI agents," which directly points to experience with language models. The emphasis on "pushing the boundaries of AI" and "staying at the cutting edge of industry trends and technologies" further supports the focus on advanced AI technologies, including GenAI and LLMs.

Overall, both the responsibilities and skills strongly indicate that the job involves working with Generative AI and language models.
